pullrequest.title: Implement a parameter to set which OSRF repos to use when building

content.raw: You are right, investigating the logic seems like we were using the NEED_PRERELEASE logic inherited from times of using sdformat prerelease in gazebo and extended to add the prerelease repo. I've removed it in this same PR and kicked off a new run of gazebo7 debbuild to see if it still works with the new logic.
content.html: You are right, investigating the logic seems like we were using the NEED_PRERELEASE logic inherited from times of using sdformat prerelease in gazebo and extended to add the prerelease repo. I've removed it in this same PR and kicked off a new run of gazebo7 debbuild to see if it still works with the new logic.
